summary: Water Jet Service website with multi-language support (Gujarati, Hindi, English), animated buttons, modern design, and SEO optimization for multiple locations in Ahmedabad
architectural_notes: Multi-language website (Gujarati, Hindi, English) with language switcher
Animated buttons with vibration and glow/shine effects
SEO optimized for locations: નિકોલ, નરોડા, હનસપુરા, નાના ચિલોડા, બાપુનગર, વસ્ત્રાલ, કથવાડા, કુબેરનગર, ઓઢવ, મણીનગર, કૃષ્ણનગર
Water Jet Service and Water Jet Foam Service offerings

existing_features.title: Diagnose and fix the issue causing the draft tab to display a completely blank white page instead of showing the application content
Ensure all required assets (fonts, images, audio files) are properly loaded and accessible
